text: This is just one piece of the puzzle. To reach the goals necessary to save the planet from climate catastrophe, we need the Senate to move forward the broad set of climate investments the House has already passed. #ClimateActionNow

By invoking the Defense Production Act, the U.S. will be able to supercharge the production of renewable energy and reduce our reliance on fossil fuels. This is something for which @USProgressives have specifically called, and I’m glad to see @POTUS take the step. https://t.co/4C38Qda3Fu

Wages are up and unemployment is down, another sign our economic recovery plan is working. But there's more to do. @POTUS Biden and House Democrats are pushing to lower costs, create more jobs, and keep this steady growth going. https://t.co/ZdFNz00Rxc

On Gun Violence Awareness Day, we #WearOrange to honor victims and survivors of gun violence. And we also honor them with action. 
Democrats are passing bills to #EndGunViolence, Republicans wave guns at survivors. #EnoughIsEnough. Get our gun safety legislation to @POTUS’ desk. https://t.co/8mtFLsx79D

As the world celebrates #OceansMonth & nations prepare to attend the UN Oceans Conference, the US must show its commitment to combatting IUU fishing. 
@RepGarretGraves and I called on @POTUS to increase regulations on this threat to human rights, US fisheries, and ocean health. https://t.co/eMp9nHR4WH

Thank you, @klara_geywitz for hosting me and @RepJayapal to discuss key progressive policies that impact both the U.S. and Germany—including addressing homelessness and combating the climate crisis. https://t.co/EFGY0ah5W1

This week we remember those who gave their lives in service to our country. I had the privilege of attending Marin County’s Memorial Day event to recognize America’s veterans and their families, and I will continue honoring them by fighting for democracy every day. https://t.co/5ZXPOR861h
